adjectives.description: conversable (comparative more conversable, superlative most conversable)

entries.meaning: (of people) Able and inclined to engage in conversation.
examples: Synonyms: affable, agreeable, approachable, genial, sociable

entries.meaning: (of people, obsolete) Able to be conversed with.
examples: […]  it is not the invisible Devil that I am enquiring after, but an appearing conversible Daemon or Evil Spirit  […]  assuming human Shape, or at least Voice,

entries.meaning: (of things, obsolete) Pertaining to, suited for or exhibiting conversation.
